name: Vaulta
description: Vaulta is a Web3 banking network designed to power the next generation of decentralized financial services. Built on one of the most reliable Layer 1 infrastructures in the industry, Vaulta combines real-time performance with institutional-grade features to deliver secure, scalable, and composable applicationsâ€”from consumer payments to Bitcoin-native yield and tokenized assets. With one-second finality, advanced on-chain memory via RAM, and integrated Bitcoin infrastructure through exSat, Vaulta serves as a financial operating system for users, developers, and institutions looking to bridge traditional finance and Web3.
